text: Ondiek malich mane inenono, yande nitie, to tinde oonge kendo obiro wuok oa e bur matut maonge gikone ka odhiyo e kar kethruokne. Ji duto modak e piny, ma nyingegi ok ondiki e kitap ngima nyaka aa chakruok mar piny nowuor ka gineno ondiek malichno, nikech yande entie to tinde oonge, to nochak oduogi kendo.
